attributes.action: Stop the Royal Mail being sold to a Foreign entity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Royal Mail is a uniquely British Institution, of which, we the citizens of the United Kingdom are proud. Neither all or part should be sold off to a Postal Organisation or Business in Europe or any other part of the World.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
